original_title: ‘Daddy’ Trump and Western Europe’s oath of allegiance — RT World News
article_summary: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz faces opposition from coalition partners over his plan to send troops to Ukraine in the event of a ceasefire, with the Social Democratic Party insisting US troops must lead any joint mission. Trump has ruled out deploying US ground troops to Ukraine, but signaled willingness for air support if hostilities end. Russia warns against any NATO or Western troop presence in Ukraine.</s>
